item.title: 国债在美联储会议前反弹，9 月减息岌岌可危
item.description: 美国国债市场在美联储 7 月份声明发布前的几个小时内大涨，原因是经济数据支持 9 月份降息。【原文：The US Treasury market rallied in the hours before the Federal Reserve’s July announcement, buoyed by economic data that backs the case for a September interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 一次性成本导致塔塔钢铁利润不及预期
item.description: 塔塔钢铁公司（Tata Steel Ltd.）第一季度利润未达预期，原因是该公司为重组和政治捐款提取了一次性准备金，而且收入降幅超过预期。【原文：Tata Steel Ltd. missed estimate for first quarter profit as the company made one-time provisions for restructuring and political donations, and as revenue declined more than expected.】

item.title: 北海石油生产商称新税收规则意味着石油产量下降更快
item.description: 公司和分析师表示，英国石油天然气公司暴利税制度的改变将加速北海的衰落。【原文：Changes to the UK’s windfall tax regime for oil and gas companies will accelerate the decline of the North Sea, said companies and analysts.】

item.title: 爱尔兰银行宣布自股灾以来首次派发中期股息
item.description: 爱尔兰银行集团（Bank of Ireland Group Plc）报告称，上半年税前利润增长了 5%，并表示将自 2008 年爱尔兰银行业崩溃以来首次派发中期股息。【原文：Bank of Ireland Group Plc reported a 5% rise in first half pretax profit and said it would pay an interim dividend for the first time since the Irish banking crash in 2008.】

item.title: 菲律宾可能在 8 月降息，预计 7 月达到通胀高峰
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，由于预计通货膨胀将在本月达到峰值，菲律宾央行可能仍将在8月份将其关键利率至少下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：The Philippine central bank may still be on track to slash its key interest rate by at least a quarter percentage point in August amid expectations inflation would peak this month, according to Governor Eli Remolona.】

item.title: 梅塞尔在首次交易中筹集到本年度最大一笔认购资金
item.description: 梅塞尔 SE 出售了 9.5 亿欧元（10.3 亿美元）的舒尔德申债务，这是今年迄今为止德国利基市场上最大的一笔交易。【原文：Messer SE sold €950 million ($1.03 billion) in Schuldschein debt, marking the biggest deal so far this year for the niche German market.】

item.title: 美国计划在 "几个季度 "内保持纸币和债券销售稳定
item.description: 美国财政部连续第二个季度保持较长期债务的季度发行量不变，并坚持其指导意见，即预计 "几个季度内 "都不需要增加票据和债券的发行量。【原文：The US Treasury left its quarterly issuance of longer-term debt unchanged for the second straight time, and maintained its guidance that it doesn’t expect to need increasing issuance of notes and bonds for “several quarters.”】

item.title: 据说中国人民银行将改变一年期贷款操作日期，以实现政策转变
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国央行正计划将向国内贷款机构注入一年期流动性的日期提前至每月 25 日，这是向主要依靠短期利率引导市场转变的一部分。【原文：China’s central bank is planning to move the date on which it injects one-year liquidity to domestic lenders to the 25th of each month, according to people familiar with the matter, as part of a shift to relying primarily on a short-term interest rate to steer markets.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚街头美元消失，居民囤积外汇
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚货币在平行市场上的交易几乎蒸发，居民们囤积美元，因为他们预期政府允许自由交易后比尔将进一步走软。【原文：Trading in Ethiopia’s currency has almost evaporated in the parallel market, with residents hoarding dollars on expectations that the birr will weaken further after the government allowed it to trade freely.】

item.title: 全球第二大比特币基金成立收费更低的分支机构
item.description: 全球第二大比特币基金的低收费版本开始在美国交易，加剧了对加密货币投资者流量的争夺。【原文：A lower-fee version of the world’s second-largest Bitcoin fund began trading in the US, intensifying competition for crypto investor flows.】

item.title: 新加坡开始实行无护照入境手续
item.description: 新加坡将从 8 月开始在樟宜机场实行无护照出入境检查，这是这个亚洲城市国家在全球最繁忙的枢纽之一提供无障碍旅行的最新举措。【原文：Singapore will start passport-less immigration clearance at Changi Airport from August, the latest step by the Asian city-state to provide hassle-free travel in one of the world’s busiest hubs.】

item.title: 杰富瑞考虑在巴西开设经纪公司，并计划增加招聘人数
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团去年在巴西开设了第一家办事处，该公司计划在巴西招聘更多员工，并正在探讨是否在巴西开设一家经纪公司，以支持在当地发行股票和债券。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc., which opened its first office in Brazil last year, plans more hiring there and is exploring whether to open a brokerage in the nation to support local distribution of equity and debt offerings.】

item.title: 通用银行就 3.44 亿欧元票据上诉获撤诉
item.description: Banca Generali SpA 从一家贸易融资公司购买了价值 3.44 亿欧元（3.73 亿美元）的证券化产品，在此纠纷中，Banca Generali SpA 赢得了英国法院的裁决。【原文：Banca Generali SpA won a UK court ruling in a dispute arising out of €344 million ($373 million) worth of securitizations it bought from a trade finance firm.】

item.title: 中国经济茶叶让金属多头感到乐观
item.description:
对全球最大消费国的悲观情绪推低了物价，但我们仍有理由保持乐观。【原文：

Pessimism about the world’s biggest consumer pushed down prices, but there are reasons to be upbeat.

】

item.title: 中国股市刺激新兴市场指数，焦点转向美联储
item.description: 新兴市场股市创下三周来最大涨幅，这主要是受到盈利和中国股市反弹的提振，因为疲软的数据燃起了刺激经济的希望。【原文：Emerging-market equities rose the most in three weeks, buoyed by earnings and a rally in Chinese stocks as weak data fueled hopes for stimulus.】

item.title: 贝莱德引领大公司竞相将私人资产注入 ETF
item.description: 包括贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. 和 Invesco Ltd. 在内的大型基金管理公司之间正在展开一场高风险的竞争，以将华尔街最时髦的投资工具与其增长最快的资产类别结合起来。【原文：A high-stakes race is taking shape between major money managers including BlackRock Inc. and Invesco Ltd. to combine Wall Street’s most trendy investment vehicle with its fastest-growing asset class.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称埃塞俄比亚到 2028 年需要 35 亿美元债务减免
item.description: 根据国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的数据，埃塞俄比亚到 2027-28 年需要约 35 亿美元的债务重组减免，这为债权人与政府谈判交易设定了关键参数。【原文：Ethiopia needs about $3.5 billion in relief from debt restructuring through 2027-28, according to the International Monetary Fund, setting the key parameters for creditors to negotiate deals with the government.】

item.title: 干预后毛里求斯卢比将迎来 2022 年以来最好的一个月
item.description: 在中央银行多次干预将卢比从历史低点抬升后，毛里求斯卢比兑美元将创下两年多来的最大月度涨幅。【原文：The Mauritius rupee is set for its biggest monthly gain against the dollar in more than two years after the central bank repeatedly intervened to lift it from record lows.】

item.title: 微软业绩下滑后，Meta 投资者将目光聚焦在资本支出上
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司的投资者希望它能比微软公司和 Alphabet 公司做得更好，让华尔街相信在人工智能上的高额投入是值得的。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. investors will be hoping it can do a better job than Microsoft Corp. and Alphabet Inc. in convincing Wall Street that lofty spending on artificial intelligence will be worth it.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司扭亏为盈计划可能在今年加速启动
item.description: Thames Water may be put into a special turnaround regime within months, a process that could lead to the break up of Britain’s largest water company.

item.title: KKR 资产销售改善，利润飙升 49%，超出预期
item.description: KKR & Co. 公布的第二季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，因为这家收购公司出售资产获得的收入超过了预期。【原文：KKR & Co. posted a second-quarter profit that beat Wall Street estimates as the buyout firm generated more income than expected from selling assets.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。投资者正在等待美联储可能降息的信号，尽管微软隔夜财报令人失望，但科技股正在反弹。与此同时，副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在关键摇摆州的民调中击溃了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的领先优势。以下是市场正在谈论的话题— Morwenna Coniam.【原文：Good morning. Investors are awaiting signals from the Fed on a possible rate cut and tech stocks are rebounding despite disappointing earnings from Microsoft overnight. Meanwhile Vice President Kamala Harris has knocked out Donald Trump’s polling lead in key swing states. Here’s what markets are talking about — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 丰收导致农作物贸易商邦吉公司收益不佳
item.description: 邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）公布的收益不及预期，农作物市场的低迷使该公司对今年下半年的前景 "看法有限"。【原文：Bunge Global SA posted earnings that missed forecasts, with the downturn in crop markets providing the company with “limited visibility” for the rest of the year.】

item.title: 乌克兰访问后中国扩大军用无人机出口限制
item.description: 中国调整了对军用无人机的出口管制，因为中国政府因支持俄罗斯在乌克兰战场上的行动而面临美国及其盟国越来越多的批评。【原文：China has adjusted its export controls on drones intended for military use, as Beijing faces growing criticism from the US and it allies over bolstering Russia’s battlefield efforts in Ukraine.】

item.title: 受 SUV 销量激增推动，马鲁蒂铃木利润超出预期
item.description: 印度最大的汽车制造商马鲁蒂铃木公司（Maruti Suzuki Ltd.）公布的季度利润好于预期，主要得益于其运动型多功能车销量的增长和产能的扩大。股价上涨。【原文：Maruti Suzuki Ltd., India’s largest carmaker, reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit boosted by higher sales of its sports utility vehicles and expanded production capacity. Shares rose.】

item.title: Ares 新成立 340 亿美元基金，打破私人信贷记录
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp. ）为其最新的直接借贷基金筹集了近 340 亿美元，这是蓬勃发展的私人信贷市场有史以来规模最大的一次筹资。【原文：Ares Management Corp. has amassed nearly $34 billion for its latest direct lending fund, the largest fundraise ever in the burgeoning private credit market.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司第一季度利润下滑，成本开始造成影响
item.description: 新加坡航空公司第一财季的利润从一年前的历史高点回落，原因是成本上升和收益率下降继续侵蚀该航空公司的盈利。【原文：Singapore Airlines Ltd. profit fell in the fiscal first quarter from an all-time high a year ago as higher costs and lower yields continued to eat into the carrier’s earnings.】

item.title: 印度遏制期权热潮，量化基金面临盈利风险
item.description: 随着印度致力于减缓股票衍生品交易的快速增长，全球和国内量化交易商在印度期权市场的利润将受到威胁。【原文：Profits for global and domestic quant traders in India’s options market are set to come under threat as the country aims to slow the rapid growth in equity derivatives trading.】

item.title: Stellantis 面临电动车型延迟上市的挑战
item.description: 由于软件缺陷，Stellantis NV 面向欧洲的一款重要的新型电动车面临延期，这阻碍了该公司重振陈旧产品线和扭转利润下滑的努力。【原文：Stellantis NV is facing delays on a key new EV model for Europe because of software bugs, a dampener to efforts to rejuvenate a stale lineup and reverse a slump in profit.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀意外加速令欧洲央行头疼
item.description: 欧元区通胀意外加快，这一结果可能使欧洲中央银行对进一步降息更加谨慎。【原文：Euro-area inflation unexpectedly quickened, an outcome that may make the European Central Bank warier about cutting interest rates further.】
